ai-an10:211.1.1_0: “Someone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:211.1.3_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:211.2.1_0: They steal. With the intention to commit theft, they take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:211.3.1_0: They commit sexual misconduct. They have sexual relations with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian. They have sexual relations with a woman who is protected on principle, or who has a husband, or whose violation is punishable by law, or even one who has been garlanded as a token of betrothal.
ai-an10:211.4.1_0: They lie. They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:211.4.1_1: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say.
ai-an10:211.4.1_6: Not for the sake of his self, or for the sake of another or for the sake of a trifling material gain,
ai-an10:211.5.1_1: And so they divide those who are harmonious, supporting division, delighting in division, loving division, speaking words that promote division.
ai-an10:211.6.1_0: They speak harshly. They use the kinds of words that are cruel, nasty, hurtful, offensive, bordering on anger, not leading to immersion.
ai-an10:211.7.1_0: They talk nonsense. Their speech is untimely, and is neither factual nor beneficial. It has nothing to do with the teaching or the training. Their words have no value, and are untimely, unreasonable, rambling, and pointless.
ai-an10:211.8.1_0: They’re covetous. They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:211.8.1_1: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:211.9.1_0: They have ill will and malicious intentions:
ai-an10:211.9.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings be killed, slaughtered, slain, destroyed, or annihilated!’
ai-an10:211.10.1_0: They have wrong view. Their perspective is distorted:
ai-an10:211.11.1_0: ‘There’s no meaning in giving, sacrifice, or offerings. There’s no fruit or result of good and bad deeds. There’s no afterlife. There are no duties to mother and father. No beings are reborn spontaneously. And there’s no ascetic or brahmin who is well attained and practiced, and who describes the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.’
ai-an10:211.11.2_0: Someone with these ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:211.12.1_0: Someone with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:211.12.3_0: Take a certain person who gives up killing living creatures. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-an10:211.13.1_0: Having given up taking what has not been given, he refrains from taking what has not been given.
ai-an10:211.13.1_1: They don’t, with the intention to commit theft, take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:211.14.1_0: Having given up sexual misconduct, he refrains from sexual misconduct.
ai-an10:211.14.1_2: even one who has sex with women who have their mother, father, both mother and father, brother, sister, relatives, or clan as guardian.
ai-an10:211.15.1_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:211.15.1_2: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say.
ai-an10:211.15.1_7: Not for the sake of his self, or for the sake of another or for the sake of a trifling material gain,
ai-an10:211.16.1_1: He doesn’t repeat in one place what he heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, he reconciles those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-an10:211.17.1_1: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable and agreeable to the people.
ai-an10:211.18.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training. They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-an10:211.19.1_1: They don’t covet the wealth and belongings of others:

ai-an10:217.1.1_0: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced.
ai-an10:217.1.2_0: And that may be in the present life, or in the next life, or in some subsequent period.
ai-an10:217.1.3_0: And I don’t say that suffering is ended without experiencing intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated.
ai-an10:217.2.1_0: Now, there are three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.2.2_0: There are four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.2.3_0: There are three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action that have unskillful intention, with suffering as their outcome and result.
ai-an10:217.3.1_0: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action?
ai-an10:217.3.2_0: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
ai-an10:217.4.1_0: They steal. With the intention to commit theft, they take the wealth or belongings of others from village or wilderness.
ai-an10:217.5.1_1: Even if he has enclosed with women who have their mother, father with a husband, or whose violation is punishable by her.
ai-an10:217.6.1_0: These are the three kinds of corruption and failure of bodily action.
ai-an10:217.7.1_0: And what are the four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action?
ai-an10:217.7.2_1: They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-an10:217.7.3_0: ‘Please, mister, say what you know.’ Not knowing, they say.
ai-an10:217.7.3_4: ‘I will not tell’ or ‘I will tell a deliberate lie for the sake of themselves or others.
ai-an10:217.8.1_1: And so they divide those who are harmonious, supporting division, delighting in division, loving division, speaking words that promote division.
ai-an10:217.9.1_0: They speak harshly. They use the kinds of words that are cruel, nasty, hurtful, offensive, and bordering on anger.
ai-an10:217.9.1_1: They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
ai-an10:217.10.1_0: They talk nonsense. Their speech is untimely, and is neither factual nor beneficial. It has nothing to do with the teaching or the training. Their words have no value, and are untimely, unreasonable, rambling, and pointless.
ai-an10:217.11.1_0: These are the four kinds of corruption and failure of verbal action.
ai-an10:217.12.1_0: And what are the three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action?
ai-an10:217.12.2_1: They covet the wealth and belongings of others:
ai-an10:217.12.2_2: ‘Oh, if only their belongings were mine!’
ai-an10:217.13.1_0: They have ill will and malicious intentions:
ai-an10:217.13.1_1: ‘May these sentient beings be killed, slaughtered, slain, destroyed, or annihilated!’
ai-an10:217.14.1_0: They have wrong view. Their perspective is distorted:
ai-an10:217.14.2_0: there’s no meaning in giving, etc.
ai-an10:217.15.1_0: These are the three kinds of corruption and failure of mental action.

ai-an10:220.1.1_0: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-an10:220.1.2_0: and after exchanging courteous talk and greetings, he sat down on one side.
ai-an10:220.1.2_1: While sat on one side that brahmin said this to the Fortunate One:
ai-an10:220.1.3_0: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell?”
ai-an10:220.1.4_0: “Unprincipled and immoral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-an10:220.2.1_0: “But what is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”
ai-an10:220.2.2_0: “Principled and moral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
ai-an10:220.3.1_0: “I don’t understand the detailed meaning of what Master Gotama has said in brief.
ai-an10:220.3.2_0: Please, Master Gotama, teach me this matter so I can understand the detailed meaning.”
ai-an10:220.3.3_0: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-an10:220.4.1_0: “Brahmin, unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of body,

ai-an10:221.1.1_0: “Someone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:221.1.3_0: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-an10:221.1.4_0: Someone with these ten qualities is cast down to hell.
ai-an10:221.2.1_0: Someone with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-an10:221.2.3_0: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-an10:221.2.4_0: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
